resources.string: Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass root detection when adding virtual cards.
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass ANZ GoMoney\'s root detection and have the ability to spoof your device to enable GoMoney Wallet (NFC Payment).
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass Semble\'s root detection, device spoofing and also bypass \"OS not Supported\" messages for Lollipop and above users.
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass TVNZ onDemand\'s Root Detection checks when watching a onDemand video.
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass 3NOW\'s Root Detection checks when entering the application.

When enabled, SuperKiwi and any of the applications listed above will display logging information in logcat for troubleshooting purposes. Its recommended to use a computer when viewing the logcat as it\'s much easier to read.
Displays helpful information about the module, troubleshooting etc.
Post a Message on the XDA Thread!

Depending on the issue, I might not always be the best person to contact. Semble and ANZ GoMoney Wallet are relatively new applications and still have bugs which is something out of my hands. If you have a payment issue, most likely contact the application provider or your bank for support. If you are having root detection problem or the module is not working then its best to contact me via XDA or email.
 
 You can contact me using any of the methods below where you can send me feedback, bug reports, feature requests or to simply follow me on social media for updates.
 
 Remember to actually write an actual message when contacting me! You'd be surprised how many people emailed me with no message.
Enable this to avoid root detection messages for the when adding virtual cards in the ASB Mobile app.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in ANZ GoMoney NZ.
Spoofs your device information to trick GoMoney Wallet to work. Cannot guarantee this will work with older devices.
Pick the device you want to use when device spoofing is enabled for ANZ. [Currently Selected: %1$s]

Allow screenshots to be taken within the ANZ GoMoney application. Do not turn on this feature unless you actually need it at it\'s huge security breach. If you indeed do use this feature, make sure no sensitive information is displayed when you screenshot.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in the Semble applications.
Bypasses the \"OS not supported\" message on officially Semble-supported devices that have newer Android OS version installed which Semble was not designed to be used on.

Spoofs your device information which will bypass \"Device Not Supported\" messages and trick Semble services to work. Made for devices that are not on the Semble Compatibility list. Cannot guarantee this will work with older devices.
Pick the device you want to use when device spoofing is enabled for Semble. [Currently Selected: %1$s]
Toggle the ability to bypass the various root checks found in the TVNZ OnDemand application.
Toggle the ability to bypass HDMI detection allowing you to output OnDemand to TV screens and monitors.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in the 3NOW application.
You MUST clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and re-login in order fro your changes to be in effect. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.

In order to spoof your device you must clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and re-login otherwise the spoofing feature will not activate. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.
